word_mean: 动脉粥样硬化：在大和中等动脉的内膜和中层形成含有胆固醇、类脂质和噬脂细胞的黄色斑块沉积物，是动脉硬化的一种极常见的形式

sentence.Network_en: It usually takes several decades for atherosclerosis to reach an advanced stage.
sentence.Network_cn: 动脉粥样硬化一般要经几十年才发展到晚期.

sentence.Network_en: The large vessels begin to develop atherosclerosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 大血管开始发生动脉粥样硬化.

sentence.Network_en: They may be due to senile atherosclerosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 可能是由于老年性动脉硬化.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: coined in German from Greek athērē 'groats' + sklērōsis 'hardening' (see sclerosis)

means.word_mean: 1. a stage of arteriosclerosis involving fatty deposits (atheromas) inside the arterial walls
